info.name: Binance delivery futures API
info.description:
Binance official supported Postman collections.
- API documents: https://binance-docs.github.io/apidocs/futures/en/ - Telegram: https://t.me/binance_api_english - Open Issue at: https://github.com/binance-exchange/binance-api-postman

request.description: Test connectivity to the Rest API.
This endpoint need your API key only, not the secret key.

item.name: Get Funding Rate History of Perpetual Futures

request.description: Kline/candlestick bars for a symbol. Klines are uniquely identified by their open time.

24 hour rolling window price change statistics.

Careful when accessing this with no symbol.

Weight:

1 for a single symbol;

40 when the symbol parameter is omitted
Latest price for a symbol or symbols.
Best price/qty on the order book for a symbol or symbols.
Get present open interest of a specific symbol.
Get present open interest of a specific symbol.

Get present open interest of a specific symbol.

query.description: Boolean value. "true": Hedge Mode mode; "false": One-way Mode

Default BOTH for One-way Mode ;
LONG or SHORT for Hedge Mode. It must be sent with Hedge Mode.
true, false；Close-All，used with STOP_MARKET or TAKE_PROFIT_MARKET.
Used with TRAILING_STOP_MARKET orders, min 0.1, max 5 where 1 for 1%
Order quantity, cannot be sent with closePosition=true

Default BOTH for One-way Mode ;
LONG or SHORT for Hedge Mode. It must be sent with Hedge Mode.

Default BOTH for One-way Mode ;
LONG or SHORT for Hedge Mode. It must be sent with Hedge Mode.
Timestamp in ms to get modification history from INCLUSIVE
Timestamp in ms to get modification history until INCLUSIVE
countdown time, 1000 for 1 second. 0 to cancel the timer

Default BOTH for One-way Mode ; 
LONG or SHORT for Hedge Mode. It must be sent with Hedge Mode.
"LIQUIDATION" for liquidation orders, "ADL" for ADL orders.
